attributes.additional_details: 100,000 signature petition to support a proposal submitted to the Government, by the Stacey Mowle Appeal, as to how the UK Government can support "real-time" UK Neuroblastoma relapse stage 4 sufferers upon referral to the US for treatment.  Neuroblastoma sufferers conduct extensive fundraising and media campaigns to raise awareness & funding.  Upon US referral the Government pay the outstanding funding balance.  Government funding may not be required.
